text: Nirvendra Kumar Mishra, also known as Munna, (1944/1945 â€“ 6 September 2020) is an Indian politician. He was a member of Samajwadi Party. He was a former Member of Legislative Assembly in 10th, 11th and 12th Vidhan Sabha of Uttar Pradesh from Nighasan constituency. He died on 6 September 2020 in Lakhimpur Kheri. == References == Category:1940s births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Uttar Pradesh
title: Nirvendra Kumar Mishra
